MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the CH8 postcode area of Holywell, affecting properties in Station Road and surrounding streets. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.21PM. We are awaiting specialist engineers to arrive on site to carrying out further investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:55am on 6th February 2021.
